name: OctoEverywhere
author: OctoEverywhere
description: OctoEverywhere Bambu Connect allows you to remotely access and control your Bambu Lab 3D printer from anywhere in the world. Get real-time monitoring, notifications, and full control through a secure connection.

form_fields.label: Serial Number（打印机序列号）
form_fields.hint: 从 https://octoeverywhere.com/s/bambu-sn 获取打印机序列号

form_fields.label: Printer IP（打印机IP地址）
form_fields.hint: 打印机的局域网IP地址，格式: 192.168.1.100
